title: EMOTIONAL DETOX GUIDED MEDITATION BUNDLE - Jen Riday
description: Craving inner peace, forgiveness & a lighter heart? The Emotional Detox Guided Meditation is your answer. Remove emotional baggage and find joy again.
cleaned_text: EMOTIONAL DETOX GUIDED MEDITATION BUNDLE You're about to take the big step of letting go of past emotional hurts (baggage) and dramatically increasing your happiness and sense of self worth. HERE'S WHAT YOU'RE GETTING INSTANT ACCESS TO: - Release pain from negative interactions with family & friends. - Begin to heal from divorce, death, trauma & other pain. - Experience deep forgiveness & peace. - Feel lighter, happier & more like your authentic self. - Enjoy relationships more fully. - Increase laughter, optimism, patience & mindfulness. - Experience healing within the convenience of your home environment and without paying for months of expensive therapy. INCLUDES 3 MEDITATIONS! We've made it easy for you to fit the Emotional Detox Guided Meditation into your schedule by creating 3 versions: Full-length (1 hour), Mid-length (30 min.) and the Mini Meditation (5 min.). The longer meditations will give you the time needed to release deeper emotional baggage, while the Mini Meditation will more easily help you clear out all the new emotional "junk" that comes up in daily life. $97 $27 ONE-TIME PAYMENT!
